TopicTitle: Little Flyer III - Solar ULM - No Batteries Included

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

For those who liked my first concept of a Little Solar Flyer, here's the update on the same.

This has no batteries at all, it can fly all day (as long as there's xenon) with only the sun and the 5 units power on the OKTO2.

it weights 1.89 tons. 73 parts. Top speed of about 40 m/s.

I haven't taken long to test it due to work, but it flies really well, it is just a bit nose heavy, but you can adjust it with the Alt+S/W trim keys to maintain a fair flight. This is most likely to be easy to solve with weight distribution, I don't just have more time for that now.

Remember to disable wheel steering as well as the motors for a more real ULM performance, as it starts raising the tail, gear up. At about 18 to 20 m/s, give it positive pitch, and you're on your way!

NOTE: Remember not being able to land? Solved with the use of EAS-4 Strut connector. Somehow it increases drag and weight, so that the little bugger is a lot more easy to land.

Fly low, slow and enjoy!

Craft File: https://www.dropbox.com/s/k0aequztsh134yz/Little%20Flyer%20III.craft
